name: White Chicken Chili
ingredients: 2 can great northern beans, rinsed and drained
2 can (4 oz each) chopped green chilies
Optional: tortilla chips, shredded cheese for topping
steps: cook chicken by saute with the onions on stove (add garlic at the end and cook till fragrant) and then shred in kitchenaid w/ mixer attachment
Add the beans, broth, chiles and seasonings. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 30 minutes.
Remove from the heat; stir in sour cream and heavy cream. If desired, top with tortilla chips, cheese and jalapenos.
story: I have thrown this in the instant pot before too, skip adding cream ingredients, cook on high pressure for 8 min & then add cream ingredients in before serving
